tool_description: Connect your OpenAI calls to the internet. Build your own version of ChatGPT
name: OpenAI with Internet
title: OpenAI with Internet

api_list.name: Chat Completions
api_list.description:
Takes a list of messages as input and returns a model-generated message augmented with real-time information from the internet as output.

NOTE: Please use your OpenAI API key generated from the [OpenAI API keys page](https://platform.openai.com/account/api-keys).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://openai-with-internet2.p.rapidapi.com/chat/completions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "openai-with-internet2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://openai-with-internet2.p.rapidapi.com/chat/completions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "openai-with-internet2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
